name: moonscape
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a view of the surface of the moon or of an area that looks like the surface of the moon: With its many craters, the terrain resembles a moonscape . It was open desert, a moonscape with not a sign of life.
More examplesFewer examplesThe barren terrain stretches so far and so wide that it often gets compared to a moonscape.The billboard was right next to the moonscape of a massive open cut coal mine.Most of the island is a moonscape of rugged black lava flows and red wind-whipped cinder cones.
